pages.text: $(li)The Wildfire is a new variant of the Blaze that can be found in the Nether Fortresses and randomly over the Nether.$(br)$(li)It has more health, more armor and deals more damage than a common Blaze.$(br)$(li)It can put up shields to become invulnerable for a short period of time.
It may drops a $(l:patchouli:armors/outvoted/wildfire_helmet)Wildfire Helmet$(/l) or a Shattered Blaze Piece on death.
